Lemon Orzo


Ingredients
2 tablespoons unsalted butter, divided
1 1/2 cups uncooked orzo
2 1/2 cups chicken stock
1 lemon lemon
3/4 teaspoon kosher salt
1/2 teaspooon garlic powder
1/4 cup armesan cheese
1 tablespoon parsley

Cooking Instructions

Gather all ingredients. Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a large
nonstick skillet over medium. Add orzo, and cook, stirring
occasionally, until light golden and toasted, about 2
minutes. Stir in chicken stock, 1 1/2 teaspoons lemon zest,
salt, and garlic powder. Bring to a simmer over medium-low.
Simmer, stirring occasionally, until orzo is al dente and
most of the stock is evaporated, 10 to 12 minutes. Remove
from heat, and fold in 2 tablespoons lemon juice, Parmesan
cheese, and remaining 1 tablespoon butter until butter is
melted. Garnish with parsley and additional lemon zest.
